title: Christmas in Germany: a story of giving
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: This film is a dramatisation of a little girl’s perceptions of Christmas in a German town, highlighting the charming traditional Christmas customs and delicate decorations and crafts of Germany. This film is suitable for lower secondary school levels. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
